title: [SOLVED]820-3476 no chime
message:
this board came in with only one area with obvious signs of water damage. replaced the bad components and reflowed smc i got it to fan spin but theres no chime.

what should i check next?

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 no chime
message:
Where is the wather damage???
Corrosion around SMC, U1900, U6100, J6100
Could be crap under SMC...

title: [SOLVED]820-3476 no chime
message:
U1950 and the components around was the only area to show water damage. I even took off smc and reballed it still no chime. There is no water damage to u1900, u6100 or j6100.

Update: ok i guess the macbook is working now. Not sure if it was my display port cable that wasnt working or if removing the jtag did anything but all good now. It wasnt chiming but still booted i guess sound options were set to mute.
